mod.name: Testers Mod
mod.description:
Welcome to the Aperture Science Cooperative Spire-Slaying Initiative, the latest and greatest in Aperture Science Testing Tracks, designed to simulate the various different floors of the Spire. Harness the power of cutting-edge Aperture technology and pit your wits against the toughest the Spire has to offer, all from within the safety of your own local Aperture Science Laboratory.
        
Includes:
        85+ cards
        12 character-exclusive relics
        5 relics available to all characters
        5 potions
        5 events
        A new act 4 boss
        And a partridge in a pear tree.
        

        
Content for all characters can be toggled in the mod settings.

relics.name: Gel Canisters
relics.description: Start each combat with 5 thetesters:Bounce_Gel and 5 thetesters:Speed_Gel.
relics.flavorText: Two large barrels of gel, labeled “DO NOT MIX”.

relics.name: Extension Cord
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 additional Orb Slots.
relics.flavorText: Now you can attach cores up to 5 feet away!

relics.name: Extra Ammo
relics.description: At the start of each combat, thetesters:Attach two thetesters:Blank_Cores.
relics.flavorText: The cores don't turn on, but they make for great projectiles to throw at enemies.

relics.name: Potato Battery
relics.description: Each combat, draw 1 card at the start of each turn until you play 4 cards in a single turn.
relics.flavorText: A small battery to boost your processing power. Short circuits when overexerted.

relics.name: Broken Radio
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, draw 2 cards and gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: The static is occasionally interrupted by a deep voice counting to three.

relics.name: Turret Redemption Line
relics.description: Defective Turrets now give [E] [E] and draw a card when played.
relics.flavorText: Please do not engage with turrets heading towards redemption.

relics.name: Disk Operating System
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Focus and 1 additional Orb Slot.

relics.name: Mask of Founder
relics.description: Whenever you are debuffed, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Make life take the lemons back!

relics.name: Moron Core
relics.description: At the start of each combat, thetesters:Attach an thetesters:Intelligence_Dampening_Core.
relics.flavorText: You might have a very minor case of serious brain damage.

relics.name: Core Bundle
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Orb Slots and thetesters:Attach 3 random Cores.
relics.flavorText: A large tangled bundle of cores. Perhaps some of these could be useful?

relics.name: Gel Pumps
relics.description: Replaces Gel Canisters. At the start of your turn, gain 2 thetesters:Bounce_Gel and 2 thetesters:Speed_Gel.
relics.flavorText: A portable device that fabricates gel, attached to your canisters.

relics.name: Runic Core
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you thetesters:Detach or Evoke a Core, lose 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: The runes are indecipherable. The technology is ancient, and incompatible with some of your systems.

relics.name: Neurotoxin Vents
relics.description: At the start of your turn, apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: If I were you, I'd take a deep breath. And hold it.

relics.name: Randolph the Red-Nosed Turret
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Sentry Turrets in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Randolph with your nose so bright, won't you guard this room tonight?

potions.name: Bottle of Bullets
potions.description: Add 3 Sentry Turrets to your hand, they cost 0 this turn.

keywords.name: Adventure Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gain Toughness whenever you draw an Attack. Heals when Evoked.

keywords.name: Anger Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gain Vigor whenever you draw an Attack. When Evoked, gain Strength.

keywords.name: Apple Core
keywords.description: Orb: When Evoked, heal and draw a card.

keywords.name: Attach
keywords.description: Attaching a Core puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Core is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Blank Core
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage when Evoked. Evokes when Detached.

keywords.name: Blue Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gain Bounce Gel. When Evoked, Splatter Bounce Gel.

keywords.name: Bounce Gel
keywords.description: Bounce gel enables you to play cards that drain bounce gel, and enables the Splatter action. Bounce gel cards are generally defensive.

keywords.name: Core
keywords.description: Orb.

keywords.name: Crazy Core
keywords.description: Orb: Plays random cards of any color for free. When Evoked, choose a card to play.

keywords.name: Curiosity Core
keywords.description: Orb: Draws cards.

keywords.name: Detach
keywords.description: Remove a Core and put a copy of card that Attaches it into your discard pile. It costs 0 this combat.

keywords.name: Drain
keywords.description:
Automatically spend this much gel to activate the following ability, if you have enough gel.
Spends both types of gel unless specified.

keywords.name: Energy Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Energy. When Evoked, gain Focus.

keywords.name: Experiment
keywords.description: This card has Ethereal and Exhaust. When you play this card, gain 1 Focus.

keywords.name: Fact Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Block for every Orb Channeled. When Evoked, gain an Orb slot.

keywords.name: Gel Core
keywords.description: Orb: Splatters.

keywords.name: Gel Core+
keywords.description: Orb: Splatters without spending Gel.

keywords.name: Intelligence Dampening Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Weak, Frail and Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Orange Core
keywords.description: Orb: Gain Speed Gel. When Evoked, Splatter Speed Gel.

keywords.name: Space Core
keywords.description: Orb: Reduces cost of cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Speed Gel
keywords.description: Speed gel enables you to play cards that drain speed gel, and enables the Splatter action. Speed gel cards are generally offensive.

keywords.name: Splatter
keywords.description: Drain 1 Bounce Gel and Speed Gel. Apply 1 Bouncy and Slippery to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Splatter Bombs
keywords.description: Whenever you attack this enemy, Splatter without losing gel.

keywords.name: Targeted
keywords.description: Whenever you attack an enemy, all Walking Turrets will target that enemy, and the previous target will lose Targeted. If no enemy is targeted at the end of your turn, a random target will be selected.

keywords.name: Toughness
keywords.description: Gain Block the next time you play an Attack.

keywords.name: Thetesters:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Wheatley
keywords.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Weak, Frail or Vulnerable.
